Hi,

regarding late-binding of components based on declared capabilities:

It just occurred to me that this is a major difference between REST  
and messaging systems; in a messaging system, the connections between  
the components (data providers and data sinks) is static (configured)  
and cannot change dynamically. This is so, because it is not possible  
to say something about the sinks (to declare their capabilities) and  
providers would have no base to make a choice on.

Just mumbling...

Jan
